The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the do not realize that they are going to be feeding the bodies of their lost members and capturing the women for themselves. It's a straight forward horror that can only really be watched once. This was a very straight foward movie that had a group of love to be interesting characters go up against their love ones love.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film.
